ai-tha-ap235:1.2_0: I was associating with the previous,
ai-tha-ap235:2.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap235:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap235:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap235:4.1_0: From here the seers were unworthy,
ai-tha-ap235:4.2_0: I used to live with ladies.
ai-tha-ap235:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap235:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sāgata.
